name: insecpwd
description: The extension detects password input fields, which would transmit your passwords over insecure means.
author: Ivan Alagenchev

preferences.name: sendOffenders
preferences.title: Report Insecure Websites
preferences.description: By reporting instances of insecure password fields, you will enable us ot contact the owners of the offending websites and help us make the web a better place. We transmit only the addresses of the offending websites and do not track any personal, or identifying information.

options.label: Yes, send website addresses to help improve the web.
